author: Deccan
title: Dictator enters Sankranti race
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Suresh Kavirayani | October 23, 2015, 23.38 pm Teaser: Third from left, Nandamuri Balakrishna, Anjali, Srivaas and Posani Krishna Murali at the launch of the trailer for Dictator in Hyderabad The teasers of Nandamuri Balakrishna’s upcoming film Dictator, his 99th film, released on Friday morning. Srivaas is directing the film and Anjali and Sonal Chauhan are playing the female leads.
For the first time, Kona Venkat and Gopi Mohan are providing the story for Balakrishna. “I am working with all new people in this film. Director Srivaas is confident about the film and I am sure of its success,” says Balakrishna.
This is also the first time that Eros is producing a Telugu film, and they are planning a Sankranti release for it.
Currently the unit is shooting some important scenes with Balakrishna, Anjali, Suman, Pavitra Lokesh and Posani Krishna Murali at a private hotel in the city.
